Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: It is not greedy to meet the needs of your body <3 It is not too much. It is exactly the right amount.  I think it's so hard because it's changed actions that lead to changed thoughts and feelings. Which means I have to start by taking new and uncomfortable actions even as my old thoughts and feelings cry out against it. My brain rarely gives a new output unless I give it new inputs. So, it's by taking the actions of a person who cares for themselves (even when we don't feel it) that we can start to believe we deserve to have enough, to feel enough, to be enough. It's not easy. It's leaping off the edge the world and trusting we can grow wings on the way down <3
